choices: Normal, cheerful harpy with brown feathers
Vicious-looking Black harpy with jet-black feathers
Noble-looking White harpy with pearl-white feathers

1.content: Which kind of harpy would you like to be?
1.title: What kind are you?

choices: Look for some breakfast to eat...
Stretch your wings and groom yourself...
11.content:
You wake up in your nest that you've built on top of a giant tree, you yawn as you stretch out your arms and wings. You're wearing a tattered-looking burgundy one-piece dress with a high neck collar, nothing else special...

What would you like to do before you start the day?
11.title: Wake up at the crack of dawn...

choices: Worms
A dead body
111.content: You go out and look for something to eat for breakfast. And you find...
111.title: Look for some breakfast to eat...

choices: Time to have some fun with him.
Eat some of the fish he already caught too.
Uh oh! Your stomach didn't agree with what you just ate.
1111.content:
As you went flying through the sky searching for something, you get an appetite for worms. You wanted to feel something good and slimy moving down your throat. You thought for a moment about searching for some but then you take a look out to the coastline. You nest was located near a beach, which meant you came across some fishermen time to time. A lot of them think you look cute, some may even say pretty or beautiful, but that was before you got close enough for them to get a whiff of your horrible smell. Right now, a fisherman was sitting on a dock connected to the beach with a bored look on his face and sitting next to him was a bait bucket. You fly down towards him and land right next to him.

"What's th..." He starts to say as he looks at you, but then he groans and covers his face as soon as his nose catches your scent. You pick up the bait bucket and look into it. You were right. There were worms in it. You start gulping them down as the disgusted human watches you. After you finish, you let out a sigh, glad to get something you like to eat. After putting the bucket down, you look where the fisherman is.
1111.title: Breakfast on the beach

choices: Put your smelly bird feet on his face
Sit on his face
11112.content:
After eating the fisherman's bait, you were still a bit hungry. So you thought about what else might be around. Your eyes drifted over to the fish the man already caught, just on the other side of the fisherman. You walked over to him and leaned over him to grab the fish, allowing him to better smell your horrible odor. He tried to cover his face and hold his breath to keep from smelling, but as you grabbed one of the fish, you decided to sit down on his lap as you started to bite into the fish.

"Get off of me, you filthy bird-girl!" He shouts through his fingers.

You looked at him and said, "I'm just getting something to eat."

"You stink! Ge..." He started to say before he started coughing and gagging on your rancid breath.

"Thank you." You say, taking it as a compliment since you are actually proud of your stench. "Do you want a better smell of it?"

Before he can respond, you make him lay on the ground then...
11112.title: Getting up close

choices: Eat the fish!
11113.content:
Suddenly, you feel an ominous gurgle in your belly. The fisherman must have heard it too, because he began to back away, hand still covering his nose. "Ooh...I like worms, but they always make me a bit gassy..."you say.
"Gassy?" the fisherman asks nervously.
PPPPPPBBBBBLLRRRRRT!
Before he can ask any more questions, you let out a noisy, wet fart! The smell spreads quickly. You take a whiff and admire your creation. "Ahh, nice and rotten-eggy...with just a hint of spoiled milk! Ehehe!" You giggled cutely at how bad your gas smelled. The fisherman, meanwhile, was dry-heaving, and ran off, presumably to vomit. Lucky for you, he left behind his catch in his haste to escape the stench!
11113.title: Tummy Troubles

choices: Take her to your nest to heal her...
Quickly heal her on the spot and leave before she takes notice...
1112.content:
You scope the forest from the air until you see a human body lying on the ground in a clearing...

You land next to it and approach it carefully, and inspect the body. She's wearing what seems to be heavy garb, and you see a holy symbol just under her unfolded dress collar and gold trimmings run along linings of her knee-length skirt, judging by the looks of her and the mace and holy charm she's also equipped with, the young girl was a cleric apprentice, she must have fallen in a battle...

You search her body to find a couple of bread loaves and apples...

Suddenly you see some twitching and hear some faint moaning, much to your surprise, It seems that she's still alive but barely...

Even a foul creature like you tends to have a soft heart, so you decide to help her...

You cover the young cleric with your horrible smell, to ensure no other beast attacks her, and then think of what to do with her...
1112.title: A Dead Cleric... Or is she?

choices: The young cleric finally comes to by morning...
Some rival harpies swoop by to attack...
11121.content:
You take the cleric to your nest in the treetops, and watch over her as you treat her wounds and making sure she survives...

Although when she wakes up, she may no like being covered with your foul stink...
11121.title: Take her to your nest to heal her...

choices: A bakery
A clothing store
A farm
A library
12.content:
At the moment, you were flying through the air enjoying the feeling of the wind rushing through your hair and your feathers, the old tan top and brown knee-length skirt you were wearing flapping in. The warm sun was shining down on you as you flew. It was the middle of the day at the moment and so far, you had a pretty boring day so far. Now you were flying around looking for something interesting to do.

You fly towards a tree to just sit for a minute. You landed on a thick branch of the tree as you catch your breath. You take a big whiff of the foul odor permeating your body and sigh proudly. Right now, you really felt like doing something gross, something that you could use your stink on. As you look down from the tree, you see a nearby place that gives you an idea.
12.title: Bored black-feathered harpy

choices: Sit back and watch mayhem unfold...
122.content:
You sneak into the back entrance of a clothing store and find that the store's not open yet...




Stealthily you decide to start your mischief by rubbing your foul smell all over some of the women's dresses and clothing and leave before the store owner comes up to open the shop...
122.title: A clothing store

choices: Check on your fellow harpies...
Go find food with your fellow harpies...
13.content:
You are a royal white-feathered harpy who is also a fierce leader of your flock. You wear what seems to be a tattered short-skirted royal dress with high front-opening neck collar and an amulet just below it...

You wake up from your giant nest planted in the treetops of a dismal forest, stretch your pearly white-feathered wings, and smell the pungent odor of yourself with great pride... What do you plan to do today?
13.title: Noble-looking White harpy with pearl-white feat...

choices: the worms
the fish
both
132.content: you and your fellow harpies find a fishing pond with a fisherman with a full bucket of bait to left of him and a bucket of sports fish right of him. now which do u take?
132.title: Go find food with your fellow harpies...

choices: the food seems to disagree the flocks stomachs
run
1323.content: u and your fellow harpies dive in to get the bait and the fish and quickly chow down then the fisherman pulls out a handgun! now WHAT?
1323.title: food

choices: go terrorize people with our gas
go back home and let loose there
13231.content: the food seems to disagree with your flocks stomach and.PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRFFFFFFFFFFFFTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! your entire flock lets out a giant fart! the stench is terrible like a combination of rotten eggs,rotten cheese,garlic,onion,dead fish,dead skunk and sewage. the horrible stench knocks the fisher man out cold and kills nearby plants. you and your flock giggle in the terrible cloud of gas you released. yet still you and your fellow harpies feel gassy. what do u do?
13231.title: gas attack!!!

choices: home
132311.content: u and your flock fly around a nearby town and fart mercilessly at people leaving them gagging and rancid. u see the sun go down after a while and decide its time to head back
132311.title: gas torture

choices: A young, Owl Harpy, who looks like a young 13 year old, and is a bookworm...
A Sexy yet Sinister looking Vulture Harpy
A zombie Harpy whose rotten flatulence can nearly cripple one's nose
A Harpy Siren whose songs could entice any man...
A Big Noble Queen Harpy with alluring and attractive pastel colored feathers...
15.title: More choices...

choices: You go out to find some things to eat and drink...
Somebody wants to visit you...
You step out to visit the abandoned academy...
151.content:
In an empty treetop village, you are a cute young Owl harpy who appears to be 13 years old, you like in an abandoned treetop village next to a huge hidden magical academy that's also abandoned. You've isolated yourself from everyone in the outside world to read your stacks and stacks of books, but it's amazing you're still sane... As you read your magic spell-books, you adjust your glasses and take a whiff of the horrible smell coming from your orange mini-skirt and beige sleeveless blouse which has a cheongsam-style collar (probably because you don't bother to bathe properly)...

You ruffle the brown feathers on you wings in excitement...



What should happen?
151.title: The Little Bookworm

choices: the encyclopedia about magic
the novel about dryad
the myth about a great treasure
1513.content: u leave your treetop and head into the abandoned academy and find a few rats for a snack u make your way into the library and are surrounded by books but which one do u read?
1513.title: the academy

choices: fly over island
go look for food
155.content: you wake up in your "palace" taking a whiff of your pungent odor and wondering and think about what your going to do today.
155.title: royal morning

info.brief_description: Play as a cute yet gross  harpy and and mess with humans and other mythical creatures...
info.description:
You're a cute harpy all beautiful yet you and your other harpy friends are gross and very smelly. (Yes, look closely into mythology, these bird-like women also smell really bad according to it) And you go on misadventures to gross out humans and other creature, through pranks, stench and other gross misconduct... (no nudity)

NOTE: May contain loli



What this interactive CAN have:

Quicksand/Mud fetish

Farting

Stink fetish

Animal poop (as long as it doesn't lead to scat porn)


What this interactive CANNOT have:

Loli Sex

Excess nudity

Actual Scat Porn
